summary: João Vuvu, lives alone in a house that requires regeneration but due to being alone he is unable to do the work. On his son's release from prison and João's ensuing deception triggers a series of somber events.
cast: João César Monteiro|Rita Pereira Marques|Joaquina Chicau|Manuela de Freitas|Ligia Soares|José Mora Ramos|Rita Durão|Maria Do Carmo Rôlo|Miguel Borges|Rita Loureiro|Ana Isabel Strindberg|Tiago Diaz|Ana Brandão|Rui Luís|Vítor Silva Tavares|Suzana Borges|Sofia Lima|Cláudia Almedia|Mário Barroso|Inês Cordovil|Manuel Quintas|Margarida Gil|Fernando Meireles|Bruno Mateus
keywords: circular traveling|old man|bus|film within a film|satire
title: Vai~E~Vem
